```{r, include=T}

library(openintro)

data <- read.csv("./Video_project_dataset.csv")
data
```


```{r}
attributes <- c("UNITID"
"INSTNM",
"STABBR",
"NUMBRANCH",
"CONTROL",
"REGION",
"HBCU",
"PBI",
"TRIBAL",
"HSI",
"WOMENONLY",
"ADM_RATE",
"COSTT4_A",
"AVGFACSAL",
"PFTFAC",
"PCTPELL",
"UG25ABV",
"INC_PCT_LO",
"PAR_ED_PCT_1STGEN",
"FEMALE",
"MD_FAMINC",
"PCT_WHITE",
"PCT_BLACK",
"PCT_ASIAN",
"PCT_HISPANIC",
"PCT_BA",
"PCT_GRAD_PROF",
"PCT_BORN_US",
"POVERTY_RATE",
"UNEMP_RATE)

// Loop over all attributes

for (attr in attributes) {
  data %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = attr, y=ADM_RATE))+
  geom_point(col = "blue")+
  ggtitle("Scatterplot")+
  theme(plot.title = element_text(size=12))
}

```
